text: In 1995, the School of Professional Studies was established with the purpose of extending the benefits of undergraduate education to persons unable to attend college in a traditional college setting. UIW realized the difficulties working adults had balancing a career, family and social responsibilities when wanting to start or continue their college degree.
Application deadline is the Sunday one week prior to the term start date.
2. Request your official transcripts from all previous universities and colleges attended after you've submitted an application
Send to: University of the Incarnate Word
Universities and colleges may send electronic transcripts to admissiondocs@uiwtx.edu

Our application page may be not be accessible or may be blocked from workplace or government networks. Please try accessing the website from a private computer/device at home or from an alternate network. If you continue to have difficulties, contact

Bring your talents and passion to our nearly 140-year-old push to make our world a more humane, just and sustainable place.
Graduate with the skills and purpose needed to face the world's pressing needs.
Gain real world experience with unmanned vehicles in our state-of-the-art AVS lab.
Be the Word in the World

Since our founding in 1881 by the Sisters of Charity of the Incarnate Word, we have challenged our students to think critically, explore curiously and to leverage their God-given talents to make positive impacts on their communities and the world around them.
Your life at UIW will be exciting, challenging, rewarding and above all, transformational. Seize this opportunity and make the most of your college experience.
Schools and colleges including five health profession schools
Faith-based university bachelor's degrees to Hispanics
UIW offers over 90 undergraduate majors, minors, and concentrations, and over 20 graduate and doctoral programs.
The School of Professional Studies offers undergraduate and graduate accelerated degree programs with a curriculum designed to respond specifically to the needs of the lifestyle of an adult student.
College of Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences
Our five Health Professions Schools advance patient well-being across South Texas and beyond.
UIW Presents 17th Annual  Red Dress Fashion Show & Health Fair
The University of the Incarnate Word (UIW) is proud to present the 17th Annual Red Dress Fashion Show & Health Fair, Tuesday, Feb. 11
UIW Places Tops for National Night Out

The University of the Incarnate Word (UIW) has once again been honored for its National Night Out event. The San Antonio Police Department selected UIW as its first-place recipient for National Night Out in the university and college category.
UIW Announces Largest Academic Gift in School  History and New Changes For 4119 Broadway

On the eve of Fall graduation, the University of the Incarnate Word (UIW) is ending 2019 with several major announcements including a new name for the property at 4119 Broadway, a new Chairman of the Board, a new international initiative and two transformative gifts, including the largest outright academic gift ever received by the University.
See how Raquel Kasprzyk, 2018, turned her student portfolio into her first job as Cinematic Animator for Sony Computer Entertainment America in California.
Meet Bryan Salvador, 2021, who spent the summer as a student researcher at the Marine Biology Laboratory in Woods Hole, Massachusetts.
Follow Alejandra Escobar, 2018, as she travels to the Rio Grande Valley to work with children in the ARISE colonias.
Enjoy UIW’s 154-acre campus close to downtown San Antonio, one of America’s strongest job producing economies.

One of the leading comprehensive universities in Texas, the University of the Incarnate Word strives to educate men and women to become concerned and enlightened citizens within a global community.
Our personal approach to education and hands-on learning experience prepares students for success in their future career. Take the first step towards your future at UIW.
